title: She Likes Homos, Not Me
description:
Jun Andou is a high school boy who spends his days hiding that he's homosexual.

One day, Jun witnesses his classmate, Sae Miura, buying a BL book at a bookstore. That encounter forces their relationship towards a new direction―

I want to like the opposite sex, even have my own child. I want to have my very own family. I desire that "normal" happiness.
―The problem is, I can't get it up to women.

Disclaimer: This is only labeled Shounen Ai because there are some gay sex scenes and his sexuality. This is not necessarily a gay love-story.

[url=https://www.amazon.co.jp/%E5%BD%BC%E5%A5%B3%E3%81%8C%E5%A5%BD%E3%81%8D%E3%81%AA%E3%82%82%E3%81%AE%E3%81%AF%E3%83%9B%E3%83%A2%E3%81%A7%E3%81%82%E3%81%A3%E3%81%A6%E5%83%95%E3%81%A7%E3%81%AF%E3%81%AA%E3%81%84-%E6%B5%85%E5%8E%9F-%E3%83%8A%E3%82%AA%E3%83%88/dp/4040725131]Manga adapted from the novel of the same name.[/url]
